text: Ordered for online carryout, food was ready when stated but one pizza had red sauce under the garlic sauce that appeared to have been attempted to be scrapped off before adding the garlic, on another I requested light sauce but it was …More

name: the players vibe
text: The service was fast and friendly. The waiting time to sit down was short, but then again they weren't too busy. The overall place is clean. The food was hot when it came out and it was delicious. It was all at a reasonable price as well.

name: Lori Hale
text: Restaurant was really cold. Employees were too busy talking to take care of customers and our pizza was barely cooked. Salad bar a good and when our waitress finally came and took our order she was really nice, however, after our pizza was delivered we disnt see her again.

name: Andrea Brooks
text: Over all the place is decent. One server is very rude. Got our orders completely wrong. And when she was told it was wrong she slammed the pizza utensil on the table and proceeded to give death stares and talk rudely about my family to her …More

name: Bill Rogers
text: Food was very good,had the two for $5(pasta and wings). People and service were great. Haven't been there for a while, nice change!
